required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of Current Interventional and Diagnostic Imaging Residents After Participation in Endovascular Simulator Training
clinical_study.official_title: Survey of Current Interventional and Diagnostic Imaging Residents After Participation in Endovascular Simulator Training Regimen

brief_summary.textblock: This study looks at the comfort of interventional and diagnostic imaging residents in performing simulated endovascular procedures after completing training on the Mentice endovascular simulator device. Implementation of a training curriculum with radiology residents interested in interventional radiology will help facilitate hands-on training in a low-risk environment and allow for safer future patient encounters.

detailed_description.textblock:
PRIMARY OBJECTIVE:
I. To measure trainee comfort performing simulated endovascular procedures after completing training on the Mentice endovascular simulator device.
OUTLINE:
Participants complete a survey over 10 minutes before and after completing training and using the Mentice endovascular simulator device.

primary_outcome.measure: Trainees' feelings about using simulation to help with procedural training
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Will measure how trainees feel about using simulation to help with procedural training, and how comfortable trainees feel performing various endovascular procedures after undergoing training on the Mentice simulator machine.

arm_group.description: Participants complete a survey over 10 minutes before and after completing training and using the Mentice endovascular simulator device.

study_pop.textblock: Current interventional and diagnostic radiology residents participating in the training curriculum on the Mentice Endovascular Simulator at MD Anderson Cancer Center.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Current interventional and diagnostic radiology residents participating in the training curriculum on the Mentice Endovascular Simulator will be eligible to participate in the survey
